name: H E L L O W O R L D
name_original: H E L L O W O R L D
description: H E L L O  W O R L D was made as a first game for my channel on youtube in just 36 hours. I choose the theme "hello world" for this game because every programmers first programme is a "Hello World" debug. The objective of the game is to write the word "HELLO WORLD" and press enter but you have virus and malware on you computer.
